English
In this high-stakes thriller, Adam Cassidy (Liam Hemsworth) is a regular guy
trying to get ahead in his entry-level job at Wyatt Corporation. But after one
costly mistake, Adam's ruthless CEO, Nicholas Wyatt (Gary Oldman), forces him
to spy on corporate rival, Jock Goddard (Harrison Ford), Wyatt's old mentor.
Adam soon finds himself occupying the corner office and living the life of his
dreams. However, behind the scenes, he is simply a pawn in Wyatt's corporate game
and realizes he must ultimately find a way out from under his boss who will stop
at nothing, even murder, to win a multi-billion dollar advantage.
